sentences.sContent: I like your sense of humor.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢你的 幽默感。

sentences.sContent: His remarks participated of the sense of humor.
sentences.sContent_eng: His remarks participated of the sense of humor.
sentences.sCn: 他的话里带有几分幽默感。

sentences.sContent: She loved everything about him -- his personality, his humor, the way he dressed.
sentences.sContent_eng: She loved everything about him -- his personality, his humor, the way he dressed.
sentences.sCn: 她爱他的一切——他的性格，他的幽默，还有他的衣着打扮。

phrases.pCn: 黑色幽默（一种病态或异乎寻常的幽默）
充满怨恨的幽默；化解严重场面或僵局的幽默（等于gallows humour）

words.tran: 诙谐的，幽默的；滑稽的，可笑的
非常严肃的；缺少幽默感的
缺乏幽默感的；一本正经的
缺乏幽默感地；一本正经地
幽默作家；富于幽默感的人
